comment: Everything is good.... but I cannot control or adjust the part where I want to listen in a particular song... its like you've freezed the adjusting button and now cannot listen to the favourite part of the particular song... if you need to you have to hear it from the beginning.... please fix that as soon as you can
the function of activity: The activity involves searching, library function, playing/pausing items, viewing downloaded songs/podcasts, downloading songs or podcasts, adding to playlists, shuffling a playlist, connecting to devices, previewing episodes, type replies to episodes and accessing history page, setting page
